<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Event Handlers
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add an event handler ([[User Interface Event Handlers]]) to the given control. Returns id of the handler or -1 when failed.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title> Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Control EHs are processed in reversed order, i.e. last added: first, first added: last. So if you have an override it should be set up in the 1st added EH.</value></part></template>
<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>When using the event names listed [[User Interface Event Handlers|here]] with the [[ctrlAddEventHandler]], [[ctrlSetEventHandler]], [[displayAddEventHandler]] or [[displaySetEventHandler]] commands, the prefix "on" in the event name must be removed (e.g. ''''ButtonDown'''' instead of ''''onButtonDown'''').</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlAddEventHandler''' [handler,function]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [handler,function]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> handler: [[String]] - handler name

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> function: [[String]] or [[Code]] - script

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_map [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["draw","_this call BIS_fnc_strategicMapOpen_draw"];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_map [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["draw",{[[hintSilent]] [[str]] _this}];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[displayAddEventHandler]], [[ctrlRemoveEventHandler]], [[ctrlRemoveAllEventHandlers]]
</value></part></template>
